thread.section_title: Shop4Seats Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Shop4Seats | shop4seats.com
thread.title: Jonathan Michels

author: Jonathan Michels
title: Jonathan Michels
text: The entire process from R&D to receiving my built-to-order product, specifically the Hampton Jack-Knife Sofa, was UN-PARALLEL. Shop4Seats.com has a wonderful, easy to navigate, site and great customer service. Nothing sits around a warehouse either. To future buyers, products are built as ordered with fresh materials and most importantly packaged with care for rough transit conditions. Thank you very much to all employees of Shop4Seats.com and associated sister companies. J. Michels; O'Brien, OR
